scripts.build: rm dist/*; browserify src/app.js -o dist/bundle.js -g yo-yoify -t [ sheetify -u sheetify-nested ] -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] -p tinyify && cat dist/bundle.js | gzip --best > dist/bundle.js.gz && cat dist/bundle.js.gz | wc -c | pretty-bytes
scripts.watch: rm dist/*; watchify src/app.js -o dist/bundle.js -d -t [ sheetify -u sheetify-nested ] -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] -v
